history.text: Hi
Have you seen any movies recently?
yes, i have
Anything good?
I recently watch another comic book movie called Iron man. I was never a big fan of the comic but this movie is awesome
I used to read Ironman when I was a kid.
Never was too in to the idea much
Who was in the film?
It has some great people in it Robert Downy Jr, Jeff Bridges, and Gwyneth Paltrow are very good in it. It has tons of action and amazing special effects.
computer effects are all the rage in films anymore. Cheap to do I suppose.
I like Downy and Bridges Gwen Is a bit skinny for my tastes though
Is it my imagination or is Downy always the smarty sort of actor? Like he is always mouthong off.

Yeah, some of it has to be. Like you I never was a fan of the comic but I watched it randomly and it did not disappoint
. Haha yeah she is twiggy, I prefer a bit more round n curver, but she is a good actress.
I suppose all that blowing up stuff makes up for the poor acting some.
he does act like that a lot but it fits the charecter this time

Jeff B i
s looking pretty old these days.
He was the bad guy in the film I think
Yeah explosions are awesome.
Explosions are great when nothing is really blowing up too. lol
it was weird seeing bridges play that role that but he so underated.
I liked Jeff is lots of other films. But playing the major bad guy is something very different I think.
Yeah, never good to see real life violence. One thing that threw me off was that it started in a terrorist cave that ends with some america at its finest
I will have to see the film I guess. Sounds good so far
It made Stan Lee even richer too lol
Stan always has a cameo part in these films. Do you recall what he was in Ironman?
yeah, i cant think of any other films were he is the straight up bad guy. he's a great actor, even without that evil look, he does great
I must have missed that
In one film Stan was a bar tender. In anothe I saw he was a man 0on the street looking up.
It must be in his contract with the studios. In addition to lots of moola.
What else can you tell me about this film?
haha man on street looking up. yeah he makes the big bucks from royalities I suppose.
Stans Marvel comics was at rock bottom before he sold some film rights. Now he is a household name almost
The only thing I never liked about Stans stories is they always want you to see the "morals" behind the story. Most people could not care less about that though
Its like actually good, it has its usual marvel good vs bad but it has some heavy aspects like tony stark is kind of a drunk in the movie or has some substance issue. Downy has some thing like that.
Downy is a drug user in real life too. Was busted some years ago and went to rehab.
I dont know social issues are important. I mean explosions, battles and the like are great but they all have effetcs
Stark was never a drink in the comic boks as far as I recall
I didnt think so
Something I always wondered about is what happened to all the citizens inside the buildings that got blown up and fell in the streets full of people? Some morals there. lol
I think that was added in possibly. is he an advocate for reform or treatment?
it only kills the bad guys of course
I think Downys court deal was he had to talk and set a good example for awhile
the good citizens and hero are spared by freak coinciednces
HArd to blow up big stuff without killing everything in sight though lol
Real life is so much more messy
true
We have been at this a good while you want to wind things up ?
but you cant kill women and children out to play in the park from the evil doers
too true
sure
have a goodun
bye
later
later

uid1response.feedback: Nice guy, good conv too. Boring film. Thanks for the work.

uid2response.feedback: I watched it almost 10 years ago and barely remembered some details
